name: On The Stage
description:
Developed in conjunction with: https://ziogiak.itch.io/
Music by me

A prototype in which the player takes the seat of the band playing a venue trying to satify the audience's requests.

As the player you'll be asked the band's name and how many songs to play. For each song you'll be shown the genre requested and you'll have to chose the correct bpms and what instruments are going to play

Had to upload a rar to google drive because it's bigger than 1gb
